string.text: {=ll2iP8yo}Using more than your available GPU memory can result in serious performance drops and stability issues. Proceed with caution.
{=WVpVmbzC}These modules are new in the game:
{=sCjtEbTF}These modules have been removed from the game:
{=sTlHHQPs}You will need to restart Bannerlord for this setting to take effect
{=0ot0eBzv}Turn Camera With Horse In First Person
{=xZ84ujuu}How many sounds could be played at once. Lower values will lower your CPU usage while higher values delivers better atmosphere.
{=Ib0N4LoW}Mute game sounds while game is out of focus.
{=aGb5H9Ni}Muffles the sound sources behind obstacles. Forced ON in Multiplayer.
{=sAa2SIgO}You can switch between different mix modes better suited to your speaker configuration.
{=s6qTeIw1}Set sensitivity for mouse movement and camera control.
{=xnGGas4h}Invert y-axis of the mouse for camera control.
{=EyYqpm5b}Set your vertical movement multiplier for direction gestures, compared to horizontal movement. Does not affect camera movement.
{=JXdwIX8Q}Set thickness for trails of ranged weapons.
{=ACIFg43o}Choose how to perform blocks. Auto will default to "By Mouse Movement" in Multiplayer.
{=iwO3g6Rz}Select how challenging the combat AI will be.
{=nDjFBDvE}Sets the maximum number of units on battles. A higher value requires better CPU and GPU.
{=y7dx24ih}Turn camera as you change direction on a horse in first person view.
{=ZKg3DqbQ}Determines the opacity of the banners shown on top of the friendly troops.
{=Vea6bRUO}Enable interface elements that report players damage and casualities in center bottom.
{=TvGJqPGp}Enable reports for deaths and knock outs.
{=K80z5onY}Determines how far will the camera be in third-person.
{=OgXnrvcA}Enables the cloth simulation. Uses GPU resources.
{=yLCSTuBw}Sets the resolution of the game. Higher resolution requires a more powerful display adapter.
{=fldPHfP6}Sets the refresh rate of the game.
{=qNPmVDmU}Sets the NVIDIA DLSS method if applicable.
{=Gd2iUUHa}Sets the quality of particles. A higher value means more detailed particles.
{=Gd2iUUHa}Sets the render quality of particles. A higher value means sharper particles.
{=dC1MBjrO}Affects the size of the texture streaming cache. A higher value requires more video memory but provides a smoother experience.
{=7phVPcDc}Sets the quality of shaders. A higher value means better graphical effects.
{=8b45xcyL}Sets the quality of trees and grass.
{=WldVAZhy}Sets the detail level of character models.
{=ZIKuUbUG}Sets the number of simultaneous ragdoll simulations.
{=xuOz73hl}Choose whether blood is visible in battles.
{=WBVMg0bd}Sets the texture filtering technique. A higher value means more detailed and sharp textures.

{=0fLpwDzk}Sets the window mode.{newline}Windowed: Runs the game on a window.{newline}Fullscreen: Runs the game in full screen.{newline}Borderless Fullscreen: Runs the game on a borderless maximized window.
{=Gl2S6WEW}Sets the monitor that the game window will be displayed.
{=KjZas5Xs}Sets the display adapter that the game will run on.
{=3oUbmqJY}Synchronizes the game to the monitor's refresh rate. Eliminates tearing artifacts.
{=qsrqjK0B}Sets the detail level of environment props.
{=BgjaAUNf}Sets the quality of water. A higher value means more detailed water simulation.
{=qDVoGsb9}Hold to give orders with a gamepad.
{=ro0NhUnJ}Set field of view for first person camera.
{=pa8A2VG3}Enable the red border around the screen when the player takes damage.
{=a8MvWaSN}Force VSync in Menus (i.e. Lobby, Inventory, Party, Character, Quest etc.)
{=TRmaxjal}Enable vertical aim correction while in third person mode.
{=9bHr3oNj}Crosshair that shows when using a ranged weapon.
{=cryvNnsO}Order visuals that are visible while giving orders in battles.
{=bfis1Rqj}Enable death location indicators that show where your teammates die.
{=8FbEybTx}Enable network alert icons.{newline}1. Latency{newline}2. Packet Loss{newline}3. Poor Server Performance
{=G2e8xucc}If the checkered patterns are not visible inside the frames, try moving the sliders.{newline}Adjust the sliders to the point where patterns are barely visible.
{=16EUzfcH}Adjust the exposure level according to your preference using the slider.
{=UixNc11t}Defend attacks with your weapon or shield.
{=VasVb9DK}Equip your weapon or change to the next one.
{=bmpagYCb}Equip your shield or change to the next one.
{=PRsSB9B8}Interact with weapons, mounts, doors, people etc.
{=4Nw1hF2R}Kick your enemies to break their guard when not attacking or defending. Bash your enemies with your equipment while defending.
{=z8XjxODK}Change to alternative usage for a weapon. Melee or ranged, one handed or two handed.
{=rP058aIm}Equip the item in your first slot.
{=wGa1SUop}Equip the item in your second slot.
{=u2dQaVY2}Equip the item in your third slot.
{=evzb1cmP}Equip the item in your fourth slot.
{=9OHGqgjH}Zoom in to aim at enemies or to look further.
{=yDr2HCFR}Switch to 360 degree view mode around your character.
{=aAAl11qM}Switch between locking and unlocking the view to the enemy currently focused at. Press longer to see the detailed display.
{=9xKCz9BE}Switch between first and third person view.
{=pQVSwtfn}Move camera closer to your character in third person view.
{=IjhCSwNn}Move camera further from your character in third person view.
{=s5EnYLUp}Cheer on click. Open Cheer wheel on hold.
{=PvNGaexX}Hold to show marks for important people, places, nameplates etc.
{=xnulLUFX}Save your game quickly with a shortcut.
{=6QiPm27r}Move your party upward in campaign map.
{=FEDEsbCx}Move your party downward in campaign map.
{=7XmaJYuh}Move your party to right in campaign map.
{=hZEAeoCk}Move your party to left in campaign map.
{=4Gdng2Tt}Hold for faster camera sliding on campaign map.
{=i5xbEcE3}Resume or pause time in campaign map.
{=O9ed2AWr}Finalize message if chat box is active. Otherwise, activate chat box.
{=L992LXVF}Toggle Camera Follow Mode. Toggle between "Focus on player" or "Free cam"
